title: userdata corrupt?
content:
My Pixel 3 went suddenly black, and rebooting resulted in a bootloop, stuck at the google logo.
So I tried to flash the latest factory image (April). Keeping the -w option (erasing userdata) results in an error message "failed to erase partition", bootloop still there.
I fear that some hardware defect on the internal storage messed up my partiotions...
Any help?
